C

call() - Method in interface com.sgware.serialsoc.CheckedRunnable
 
CheckedRunnable - Interface in com.sgware.serialsoc
A functional interface similar with Runnable, except that it declares a checked exception, and similar to Callable except that it returns void.
close() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
close() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
com.sgware.serialsoc - package com.sgware.serialsoc
Wrappers for ServerSocket and Socket that provide useful events, guarantee the order of those events, and ensure all events happen on the same thread.
createReader(Socket) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Creates an instance of BufferedReader to read from a Socket.

Bind and return a ServerSocket.
createSocket(Socket) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Create an instance of SerialSocket from a Socket accepted by this server.
createWriter(Socket) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Creates an instance of BufferedWriter to write to a Socket.

E

execute(CheckedRunnable) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Runs an an operation on the main thread which called SerialServerSocket.run().

G

getServerSocket() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Returns the ServerSocket this server is using, or throws an exception if it has not yet been bound.

O

onClose() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
This method runs exactly once on the main thread when the server is closed, which can happen when the SerialServerSocket.close() method is called, when the main thread is interrupted, when the server socket is disconnected, or when an uncaught exception is thrown on the main thread.
onClose() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
This method runs exactly once on the main thread when the socket is closed, which can happen when the close() method is called or when the socket is unexpectedly closed, for example by the client.
onConnect() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
This method runs exactly once on the main thread after this socket has been created and before all other events.
onDisconnect() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
This method runs exactly once on the main thread after the socket is closed and after all other events for this socket.
onException(Exception) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
This method runs on the main thread when an uncaught exception is thrown on the main thread.
onStart() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
This method runs exactly once on the main thread after the server socket has been created and bound and before all other events.
onStop() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
This method is called exactly once after all other events.

R

receive(String) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
This method is called from the main thread every time a new line of input is read from the socket.
run() - Method in interface com.sgware.serialsoc.CheckedRunnable
Perform the operation, possibly throwing an exception in the process.
run() - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
 

S

send(String) - Method in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
This method sends a string via this socket's output stream.
SerialServerSocket - Class in com.sgware.serialsoc
A wrapper around ServerSocket that accepts new SerialSockets and ensures all events happen on the same thread.
SerialServerSocket() - Constructor for class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialServerSocket
Constructs a new serial server socket.
SerialSocket - Class in com.sgware.serialsoc
A wrapper around Socket that listens for lines of input and ensures all events happen on the same thread.
SerialSocket(SerialServerSocket, Socket) - Constructor for class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
Constructs a new serial socket.
server - Variable in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
The server that created this serial socket.
socket - Variable in class com.sgware.serialsoc.SerialSocket
The network socket used for input and output.
